response.overview: Sent into a drunken tailspin when his entire unit is killed by a gang of thrill-seeking punks, disgraced Hong Kong police inspector Wing needs help from his new rookie partner, with a troubled past of his own, to climb out of the bottle and track down the gang and its ruthless leader.
response.tagline: Failures and suffering make a real hero.
response.title: New Police Story

titles.title: Hong Kong Kokusai Keisatsu: New Police Story

cast.name: Yoki Man Si-Kei
cast.character: Female Passerby Robbed of Hand Bag

release_dates.note: Hong Kong Film Festival in Tokyo
